CutSceneText.Text: It should be safe now, since we came this far.
Thank you. I would've been in big trouble if it weren't for you men.
But Lord Mikael Rheal, I have something to tell you.
... What is it?
It wasn't a coincidence that the Trolls attacked you.
... You mean those Trolls were waiting for me?
That's it. And the person who plotted it was... Jurid Jeridise.
What did you say!? My big brother did this?
Yes. He almost got me and [%username] too, but we managed to survive.
My big brother would do something like that...? I can't believe this tale.
Please remember how they withdrew first from the hunting ground!
But, brother told me he wasn't feeling too well...
... You mean...?!
It was all planned. I obtained information that a certain drug has entered Juhdenil from Tijerid, and I followed its path.
While searching for its traces, one of our agents confirmed that the item has ended up with Jurid.
That agent was discovered by Jurid, but sent me a note though this fellow to let me know what happened.
A drug...?
I don't know exactly what it is made of, but it seems that monsters injected with it turn extremely violent and also become several times stronger.
So is that how it happened... ....Eh!?... My, my body...
Lord Rheal!!
[%username], I will return first to the castle with Lord Rheal!
